Content: (As you grab her Amelia stops you.)|Kidnapping one of them is enough, the other stays here.
That's enough.|You can have a taste of your own medicine.
Fine, I will.|(She tightens her grip and forces you across the room.)
Stop trying to argue. It doesn't suit you.|(Amelia forces you to strip and ties you up.)
I'm not trying that again,|but I think she might yield to you now.
